amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to authorize a land transfer between the Port of Whitman and the Army Corps of Engineers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McMorris Rodgers amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A038) offered by Mrs. McMorris Rodgers.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mrs. McMorris Rodgers.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McMorris Rodgers amendment (A038) Agreed to by voice vote.
